Articles.Content:
I have been trying to get this satellite contract to work all night.  I've done about prior contracts, no problem, on Kerbal (including a Kolinya orbit), and then on Mun. This is the first in MinMus.  Please take a look at the picture.  Any assistance will be very helpful

https://imgur.com/lhWA4Nt

Thank you
Yeah I don't see anything particularly wrong. Is it a 3 star contract? They can be quite picky. I'd right click my engine and set the thrust to 1% and get my periapsis and apoapsis exact.

Welcome to the forums. Sometimes creating a quicksave, and then loading the quicksave will allow the contract to complete properly.

 

Edited November 22, 2017 by bewing
